version_description:
Ads removed.
Stamina can now be refuelled in Replay mode.
Fixed display issues of Logos and Avatars.
Squad members can see what sniper requested to participate in Domination or Tournament.
Easier to gain the Royal Cup. Royal Cup candidate

Daily Rewards! Return every day and get valuable rewards: diamonds, boosters, face masks and many more!
Most loyal snipers will get the World Cup!
Domination: rules and times were changed. Leagues are introduced, and Domination mode is available for

• The Guild of Mercenaries has been added! You can hire other players to help you win cups, or you can become a mercenary and earn diamonds when other players hire you.
• The new "Black Phantom" rank has been added.
• A new restriction has been adde

• Game settings
Two separate sensitivity settings sliders have been added, for both zoomed-in and zoomed-out aiming for optimal gaming experience.

• Mercenary status indicator
Mercenary status indicator [M] is now visible in all ratings, chat
Minor bug fixes

- New large scale urban maps for even bigger multiplayer battles.
- New max performance adjustment features Smart Helmet and Smart rifle 2.0 for the most skilled snipers.
- New Alliances rating system.
- New face mask The Cat and new maintenance
Minor bug fixes

- A Relocation feature has been added: in Tournament and Domination battles all players now can relocate themselves to another map, right in the middle of a battle.
- Minor bug fixes

- In team battles, snipers on your team are now visible;
- Settings for the Smart helmet and Smart rifle can now be unique for each helmet and rifle;
- The Thermal Imager button now can be relocated to the bottom of the screen;
- The Mercenaries
It's Halloween at the Arena! Enjoy the festive maps and fun battles with Jack O'Lanterns! Unique avatars, camouflages and tons of surprises await.
It's Halloween at the Arena! Enjoy the festive maps and fun battles with Jack O'Lanterns! Unique avatars, camouflages and tons of surprises await.

- The name of the battle mode "Team Deathmatch" has been changed to "Squad Deathmatch".
- A new personal battle mode "Team Deathmatch" has been added. Rankpoints earned in this mode are added to your Personal Rating.
- A penalty for losing a Domina
We have made a number of minor game improvements to give you a better game experience. Enjoy the game and have fun!

• The new "Fireteam Tournament" game mode brings a new level of action-packed gameplay! Create or join a Fireteam of between 2 and 6 snipers, participate in daily battles and win the season to unleash the might of the battle Drones.
• New seasonal cam

• The new "Fireteam Tournament" game mode brings a new level of action-packed gameplay! Create or join a Fireteam of between 2 and 6 snipers, participate in daily battles and win the season to unleash the might of the battle Drones.
• New seasonal cam
We have made a number of minor game improvements to give you a better game experience. Enjoy the game and have fun!

- Optimized for iPhone X
- Fireteams can now be moderated and searched by name

A feature to pre-load all game maps via the game settings has been added.
The game interface has been optimized for iPhone X.
Other minor improvements.

- A new feature allows you to block Chat messages from any player
- A new feature allows you to report abusive Chat messages
We have made a number of minor game improvements to give you a better game experience. Enjoy the game and have fun!

- The first drones have launched into the sky above the Arena! This experimental technology is currently working in test mode
- Minor game performance improvements
We have made a number of minor game improvements to give you a better game experience. Enjoy the game and have fun!

- Elite fireteams have been added.
- Weapon cases have been added.
- Top-5 tournament and Top-5 alliances ratings has been added to the main menu.
- Drones launching button has been relocated.

- A new Duel mode has been added. In the Duel mode snipers will be able to test theirs skills against each other on special arenas!
- A hirers rating and hirers top-5 has been added. The best hirers must be rewarded!
- A way to get an unique squad f

- A new Duel mode has been added. In Duel mode, snipers will be able to test their skills against each other in special arenas!
- A hirers' rating and hirers' top-5 list has been added. The best hirers will earn rewards!
- We have added a option to

- A new game mode called Hero League has been added;
- Added a new game reward;
- Added three new ranks;
- Added new ways to obtain Winter Sport rifles;
- Implemented changes to the squad and personal flag mechanics;
- Added the ability to
Various minor improvements to make your gaming experience better. Be sure your game is up to date so you can have the best time playing!

- Three brand new weapons with special characteristics that increase a player's efficiency in Raids!
- New camouflage for helmets, adding advanced capabilities to strengthen snipers and their squad!
- Mini-spike anti-personnel guided weapon! Use
Minor bug fixes

A new Squad raid and squad level mechanic has been added!
Participate in thrilling Squad raids, complete Raid tasks, level up your squad and dominate on the battlefield!
Minor bug fixes

- We have added a new Premium account. The Premium account gives a 50% increase in rankpoints and cash, and unlocks simultaneous delivery of up to 5 upgrades.
- We have added a new Daily pass account. The Daily pass account unlocks new daily bonuses, w

• New convenient interface with detailed navigation and personal schedule feature
• Characters with unique skills set to utilize different playstyles
• New 3D models for every character

3. A new settings screen for a more flexible game configuration.
